forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending this morning. Then remaining mainly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with rain ending for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 16C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 60F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 19C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 66F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 19C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.
